knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

```{r}
library(tm)
library(SnowballC)
library(wordcloud)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(RCurl)
library(textclean)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
library(corpus)
```

```{r}
col_types = cols(
  date = col_character(),
  title = col_character(),
  content = col_character(),
  URL = col_character()
)
```

```{r}
data <- read_delim("data/TASS_ru_egypt1.txt", delim = "*", col_types = col_types)
```

```{r}
data <- data %>%
  mutate(date = dmy(date))
```

```{r}
data <- data %>%
  filter(!is.na(date))
```
